other_tests.findings: Opening pressure of 21 cm of water; flow cytometry of the cerebrospinal fluid showed normal B cells and T cells.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Repeat lumbar puncture showed no white cells and a negative cerebrospinal fluid VDRL test.

other_tests.findings: Biopsy was planned due to concerns of giant-cell arteritis, but results are not mentioned.
Lichenoid dermatitis with focal epidermal keratinocyte necrosis and a superficial and mid-dermal perivascular infiltrate composed mainly of plasma cells.
